identity.title: Determining Whether One is a Teenager (Case 2)

content.prompt: Construct a program that asks the user to enter a string that has the user name and age separated by a colon, and prints whether the user is a teenager. Make sure that the program handles all possible exceptions. The program must ask the user for an input until the user enters a string that could be processed without any exception.
